name: Garden of Avarice (IGMC 2018)
description:
A short demo for Garden of Avarice. Contains the first dungeon and boss. There are some things missing in this demo/prototype, such as much while walking around the dungeon.

Summary: A dungeon crawler where you place as Aacaia, a homunculus searching for something called "The Goddess' Tear".

Characters:

Aacaia: A homunculus.

Lydia: Sexy vampire lady.

Autumn: Seems to be a treasure hunter of some kind. Possibly also a thrill-seeker.
